CatDescriptText: Cutline of related images published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 20, 1969, page 1 reads: " BCC Leaders and Marchers. The city's "Black Monday" demonstration march in behalf of the Black Construction Coalition's drive to gain construction jobs for blacks was led by BCC leaders and included an estimated 10,000 persons."
TitMainTitle: Black Construction Coalition Black Monday demonstration with large crowd of protesters gathered at Centre Avenue and Crawford Street near Civic Arena, with Connelley Trade School in background
